abstract: AllianceBernstein isn’t usually known for making big public statements. But when it comes to Novartis’s proposed takeover of the shares in Alcon it doesn’t already own, the gloves are apparently off. (Read the letter on DealBook.)
snippet: AllianceBernstein isn’t usually known for making big public statements. But when it comes to Novartis’s proposed takeover of the shares in Alcon it doesn’t already own, the gloves are apparently off. (Read the letter on DealBook.)
lead_paragraph: AllianceBernstein, the big money manager, isn’t usually known for making major public statements. But when it comes to Novartis‘s proposed takeover of the shares in Alcon it doesn’t already own, the gloves are apparently off.

headline.main: AllianceBernstein Takes Aim at Novartis Over Alcon
